item.description:
Join fellow Members and Guests of the South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group for a fun Thursday Night Dinner @ Nino's Steak and Chop House in Hingham; your pick of the poll for our "N" restaurant and a four-and-a-half star event when we dined there in August of '08!

This restaurant, located in a grand stone building next to an old quarry, is a perennial favorite on the South Shore and, judging from our members' comments at events and now from their votes, it is an SSDOMG favorite as well.

We will be heading there on Thursday, September 24th at 6:45 PM and we're reasonably confident that more than a few of you will want to join us around the table.


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Nino's Steak and Chop House
Thursday, September 24th, 2009 @ 6:45pm
415 Whiting Street
Route 53
Hingham, MA 02043
781-340-7300
http://ninossteakandc...

Organizer(s): Mike & Jeanne

Min/Max: Max of 25 people.

Guests: 1 per Member

Price Range: For our area, Nino's falls slightly into the higher end of "moderate", with the average cost per diner generally running from $20.00 - $40.00.

Cash Only Policy: Please bring cash! Paying for all of our meals in cash has been SSDOMG'S policy for over three years. It allows us to avoid the confusion of having the waitstaff run multiple credit card slips and generally helps to keep things simpler for everyone.

Event Fee: Annual Members and one Guest- FREE, Group Members - $2, Guests - $2

RSVP Deadline: 7:00 PM on Wednesday , September 23rd. Any changes made after this time may not be seen by an Event Organizer. Changes to No after this point will be considered No-Shows per our guidelines on the About Us page.

Meeting Location: Outside the front door if it's nice out. We will then go in together as a Group. Otherwise, inside the Lobby. If you arrive after we are seated the reservation is under "Mike & Jeanne" as well as "South Shore Meetup Group".

Special Note: Annual Members are allowed to bring ONE GUEST FREE to this event.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions:

From Rt 3: Exit 15 - Derby Street, Hingham. Follow Derby Street straight past the Derby Shoppes and take a Left at the 2nd light onto Cushing Street. Follow Cushing Street to the next light. Take a left onto Route 53N and pick-up form Route 53N below.

Heading South on Route 53: 1/4 mi south of the Weymouth line on the left.

Heading North on Route 53: 1/4 mi north of Linden Ponds on the right. (About 1.5 miles north of the light at the intersection of Cushing Street.)

Parking: In lot behind restaurant.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet outside the Front Door. If you arrive late, our reservation is under 'Mike and Jeanne', also 'South Shore Meetup'.

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: "N" is for NINO'S!
